title: Traditional Express
description: The traditional coffee made with hot water and ground beans

title: Espresso Americano
description: Diluted espresso, less intense than traditional espresso

title: Iced Espresso
description: Drink made with espresso and ice cubes

title: Café con leche
description: Half and half of traditional espresso with steamed milk

title: Latte
description: A shot of espresso with twice as much milk and creamy foam

title: Capuccino
description: Cinnamon drink made with equal doses of coffee, milk and foam

title: Macchiato
description: Espresso coffee mixed with a little hot milk and foam

title: Mochaccino
description: Espresso with chocolate syrup, little milk and foam

title: Hot Chocolate
description: Drink made with chocolate dissolved in hot milk and coffee

title: Cuban
description: Iced espresso drink with rum, cream and mint

title: Hawaiian
description: Sweet drink made with coffee and coconut milk

title: Arabic
description: Drink made with Arabic coffee beans and spices

title: Irish
description: Drink made with coffee, Irish whiskey, sugar and whipped cream
